# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_executable(ydb-core-util-ut)


target_include_directories(ydb-core-util-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-core-util-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-core-util
  library-cpp-getopt
  library-cpp-svnversion
  cpp-threading-future
)

target_allocator(ydb-core-util-ut
  system_allocator
)

target_link_options(ydb-core-util-ut PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)

target_sources(ydb-core-util-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/address_classifier_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/bits_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/btree_cow_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/btree_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/cache_cache_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/cache_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/circular_queue_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/concurrent_rw_hash_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/event_priority_queue_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/fast_tls_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/fragmented_buffer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/hazard_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/hyperlog_counter_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/interval_set_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/intrusive_fixed_hash_set_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/intrusive_heap_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/intrusive_stack_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/lf_stack_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/log_priority_mute_checker_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/lz4_data_generator_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/operation_queue_priority_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/operation_queue_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/page_map_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/queue_inplace_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/queue_oneone_inplace_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/simple_cache_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/stlog_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/token_bucket_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/ui64id_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/ulid_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/util/wildcard_ut.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-core-util-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  10
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-core-util-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-core-util-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-util-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-util-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

vcs_info(ydb-core-util-ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-util-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
